dogs.name: Boomer
dogs.description:
Boomer has a big personality, not that you would expect any less from a lab/golden mix. If you're looking for a running partner, Boomer is the perfect dog for you.

Fair warning: he sheds. A LOT.

dogs.name: Tucker
dogs.description:
Tucker has a face that will melt your heart. If he wants another treat, all he has do is tilt his head to get one.

He hasn't met another dog he doesn't like.

He's not quite house trained, but we're working on it.

dogs.name: Sadie
dogs.description:
Sadie is the ultimate lap dog. Small, cuddly, and cute as a button, she'll spend the entire day in your arms if you'll let her.

Her favorite activities include snuggles, naps, and snuggling while napping.

dogs.name: Harley
dogs.description:
Harley has a big heart and a wet nose.

A life with Harley means belly rubs and slobbery kisses. Keep an eye on your food, though. If you're not paying attention, he'll snatch a sandwich right out of your hands.

dogs.name: Carlie
dogs.description:
As you can problably tell from her photo, Carlie's favorite game is fetch.

Like most golden/lab mixes, Carlie has a larger-than-life personality. If you enjoy spending time ourdoors, she's the perfect companion.

Carlie likes to spend her days swimming, hiking, and enjoying nature in all its forms.

dogs.name: Gizmo
dogs.description:
Puppies have limitless energy... but not Gizmo! He was born to nap.

If your ideal dog is one who will spend lazy Sunday's curled up on the couch binging on Netflix, look no further! Gizmo will watch anything: reality TV, scifi, drama, rom coms.

As long as he's cuddled up with his human, life is good.

dogs.name: Joy
dogs.description:
Joy's original owners are moving internationally and can't bring her with them, so they're working us to find her a new, loving home.

She's great with children and other pets, but is very active and requires a family that can provides lots of attention. If you live an active lifestyle and can devote time to taking her for long walks, Joy will make a wonderful addition to your family!

dogs.name: Zeus
dogs.description:
Zeus packs a lot of personality into a little body.

At 13 years old, he's far from young. But that doesn't mean his best years are behind him. Bichons are adorable little dogs... with funny little quirks.

Zeus loves to cuddle up on the couch and follow you around the house like a shadow. But he'll try to chase deer in your yard, and obsessively eats tissues if left in reach.

Zeus has a lot of love to give for the right family.

dogs.name: Zoey
dogs.description:
Zoey's lived a full life, and is ready to retire with a quiet family.

Her previous owner passed away. She's best suited for an older family without small children.

If you're looking for someone to sit at your feet while you watch Netflix, Zoey would love to meet you.

dogs.name: Mandy
dogs.description:
A cute cuddly golden retriever puppy? What's better than that!?!

A puppy this cute will get adopted fast, so if you're interested, don't wait. Apply today.

dogs.name: Cooper
dogs.description:
The beagle side of Cooper loves hiking in the woods, tracking a good scent. The King Charles Spaniel side loves being pampered.

If you want a dog that offers a bit of everything, Cooper is the perfect fit.

He does have that trademark beagle howl, but he only uses it if you're slow to give him dinner.

dogs.name: Patches
dogs.description:
Patches was born to be a frisbee dog. He's smart, athletic, and easy-to-train (he's very food-motivated).

He's not great with other pets, but his small size makes him perfect for apartment living... as long as you take him for a few long walks each day to burn off his energy.

He's the perfect fit for someone with an active lifestyle and a big heart.

dogs.name: Delilah
dogs.description:
Look at that face!

As a senior dog, Delilah spends a lot of her day cuddled up next to her humans. Whether she's watching TV, enjoying a snooze in the sun, or snoring in the AC, Delilah is a low energy, low maintenence dog.

dogs.name: Bunny
dogs.description:
Yorkies are the smallest big dogs you'll ever meet. They pack the personality of lab into the body of a stuffed animal.

Bunny is just as comfortable going on hikes as he is cuddling on the counch. If you're looking for an all-around great dog with a big heart and tiny legs, look no further.

dogs.name: Barney
dogs.description:
Small, cuddly, and prone to snoring, Barney is the perfect pal for someone with a laid back lifestyle.

If your idea of excitement is sipping coffee while you watch squirrels forage for food, Barney would love to keep you company!
